title: SanDroid is now distributing Xunity Aurora Mini Android TV Boxes
text:
Android TV boxes are the newest gadgets in the world of entertainment. They were introduced a year ago but now they have been improved immensely. Early models were not so capable devices and lacked the performance needed for high definition entertainment but it has totally changed now. With 4K Ultra HD resolutions on the verge of becoming the native resolution by 2017, the mobile industry is catching up fast. This leaves a big gap for more affordable entertainment devices that can power Full HD content on the big screen display.
Xunity Aurora Mini is a similar device that does everything for you at a reasonable price. It is an Android powered mini TV box that connects to your HDTV via HDMI. It transforms your HDTV in to a complete Android UI that opens a whole new world of entertainment.
Everyone is already aware of the features Android provides when it comes to gaming and entertainment. Users are able to connect to their friends and family through hundreds of social networking and video call applications. They can also use Android for productivity such as Office for Mobile, Google Drive, One Drive, Dropbox and much more. All these things are supported by Xunity Aurora Mini TV box as well.
Xunity Aurora Mini Specifications:
CPU 2.0 GHz Quad core
GPU Octa-core Mali 450
RAM 1 GB DDR3
Storage 8 GB Nand Flash
Connectivity Wi-Fi & Ethernet
Operating System Android 4.4 Kit Kat with Xunity UI
Video Output 1080p HDMI
Price £99.99
Xunity Aurora Mini is designed for the first time buyers who want to experience Android on their TV. Even at an affordable price, the device features high-end specifications. It supports Full HD 1080p video output, which is good enough to stream HD movies, and TV shows on your HDTV.
Xunity Aurora Mini requires an Internet connection in order to stream videos from online sources or various applications available in Play Store. It comes with Android 4.4 Kit Kat with a custom designed Xunity UI. The custom UI enhances the overall user experience with a simple and elegant design as well as easy navigation.
Users can store plenty of applications with the help of 8 GB on-board storage (actual usable storage will be lower due to system resources). In terms of performance, users will not feel any lag or freezes thanks to a quad-core CPU, octa-core graphics chip and 1 GB DDR3 memory.
The high-end specifications ensure that users get a smooth overall experience without any stutter or lag during streams. There are hundreds and thousands of Android applications available on Play Store, which provide plenty of entertainment. You can download apps to stream movies and TV shows or keeps your kids occupied by thousands of fun games.
Many AAA PC and console titles are being ported to Android so children can enjoy playing popular games such as Portal 2, Grand Theft Auto, Angry Birds and many more. Xunity Aurora Mini provides an optimal user experience without any issues. It is more powerful compared to more expensive Android TV boxes available in the market at the moment. Even with a cheaper price, it does not compromise on performance.
The compact case is made up of good quality plastic that ensures durability and reliability. The small size of the device enable users to place it anywhere in their living room or even place it behind their HDTV. As a result, there will not be wire clusters that ruin the overall look of your room.
Xunity Aurora Mini is compatible with any TV or screen that features a HDMI port. Users can even connect it to their monitors and enjoy movies and TVs from the comfort of their bed. If you are in the market of Android boxes and not willing to spend a lot of money on the device then Xunity Aurora Mini is the ultimate choice for you.
It provides the same experience as many high-end boxes while being light on the pocket. Xunity Aurora Mini is available at SanDroid UK for an introductory price of £99.99. SanDroid provides excellent sales and after sales support ensuring the best customer experience in the area. You can order it online and receive it within a day or two.
